verses.verse: וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> vay-dab-Ber spake יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to מֹשֶׁ֥ה <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh unto Moses לֵּאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> le-Mor. saying

נְקֹ֗ם <S%H5358><s%> ne-Kom, Take נִקְמַת֙ <S%H5360><s%> nik-Mat full בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel מֵאֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> me-'Et הַמִּדְיָנִ֑ים <S%H4084><s%> ham-mid-ya-Nim; of the Midianites אַחַ֖ר <S%H310><s%> 'a-Char afterward תֵּאָסֵ֥ף <S%H622><s%> te-'a-Sef shalt thou be gathered אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to עַמֶּֽיךָ׃ <S%H5971><s%> 'am-Mei-cha. unto thy people

וַיְדַבֵּ֤ר <S%H1696><s%> vay-dab-Ber spake מֹשֶׁה֙ <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh And Moses אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to הָעָ֣ם <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am unto the people לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> le-Mor, saying הֵחָלְצ֧וּ <S%H2502><s%> he-chal-Tzu Arm מֵאִתְּכֶ֛ם <S%H853><s%> me-'it-te-Chem אֲנָשִׁ֖ים <S%H376><s%> 'a-na-Shim men לַצָּבָ֑א <S%H6635><s%> latz-tza-Va; of yourselves unto the war וְיִהְיוּ֙ <S%H1961><s%> ve-yih-Yu may go עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- against מִדְיָ֔ן <S%H4080><s%> mid-Yan, and let them go against the Midianites לָתֵ֥ת <S%H5414><s%> la-Tet to execute נִקְמַת־ <S%H5360><s%> nik-mat- vengeance יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh the LORD בְּמִדְיָֽן׃ <S%H4080><s%> be-mid-Yan. of Midian

אֶ֚לֶף <S%H505><s%> 'E-lef A thousand לַמַּטֶּ֔ה <S%H4294><s%> lam-mat-Teh, throughout all the tribes אֶ֖לֶף <S%H505><s%> 'E-lef A thousand לַמַּטֶּ֑ה <S%H4294><s%> lam-mat-Teh; the tribes לְכֹל֙ <S%H3605><s%> le-Chol of all מַטּ֣וֹת <S%H4294><s%> mat-Tot the tribes יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel תִּשְׁלְח֖וּ <S%H7971><s%> tish-le-Chu shall ye send לַצָּבָֽא׃ <S%H6635><s%> latz-tza-Va. to the war

וַיִּמָּֽסְרוּ֙ <S%H4560><s%> vai-yim-ma-se-Ru So there were delivered מֵאַלְפֵ֣י <S%H505><s%> me-'al-Fei out of the thousands יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel אֶ֖לֶף <S%H505><s%> 'E-lef a thousand לַמַּטֶּ֑ה <S%H4294><s%> lam-mat-Teh; of [every] tribe שְׁנֵים־ <S%H8147><s%> she-neim- both עָשָׂ֥ר <S%H6240><s%> 'a-Sar ten אֶ֖לֶף <S%H505><s%> 'E-lef thousand חֲלוּצֵ֥י <S%H2502><s%> cha-lu-Tzei armed צָבָֽא׃ <S%H6635><s%> tza-Va. for war

וַיִּשְׁלַ֨ח <S%H7971><s%> vai-yish-Lach sent אֹתָ֥ם <S%H853><s%> 'o-Tam מֹשֶׁ֛ה <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh And Moses אֶ֥לֶף <S%H505><s%> 'E-lef a thousand לַמַּטֶּ֖ה <S%H4294><s%> lam-mat-Teh of [every] tribe לַצָּבָ֑א <S%H6635><s%> latz-tza-Va; them to the war אֹ֠תָם <S%H853><s%> 'O-tom וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et פִּ֨ינְחָ֜ס <S%H6372><s%> pin-Chas them and Phinehas בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son אֶלְעָזָ֤ר <S%H499><s%> 'el-'a-Zar of Eleazar הַכֹּהֵן֙ <S%H3548><s%> hak-ko-Hen the priest לַצָּבָ֔א <S%H6635><s%> latz-tza-Va, to the war וּכְלֵ֥י <S%H3627><s%> u-che-Lei instruments הַקֹּ֛דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> hak-Ko-desh with the holy וַחֲצֹצְר֥וֹת <S%H2689><s%> va-cha-tzo-tze-Rot and the trumpets הַתְּרוּעָ֖ה <S%H8643><s%> hat-te-ru-'Ah to blow בְּיָדֽוֹ׃ <S%H3027><s%> be-ya-Do. in his hand

וַֽיִּצְבְּאוּ֙ <S%H6633><s%> vai-yitz-be-'U And they warred עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- against מִדְיָ֔ן <S%H4080><s%> mid-Yan, against the Midianites כַּאֲשֶׁ֛ר <S%H834><s%> ka-'a-Sher after צִוָּ֥ה <S%H6680><s%> tziv-Vah commanded יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh as the LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- מֹשֶׁ֑ה <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh; Moses וַיַּֽהַרְג֖וּ <S%H2026><s%> vai-ya-har-Gu and they slew כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- every זָכָֽר׃ <S%H2145><s%> za-Char. all the males

וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et מַלְכֵ֨י <S%H4428><s%> mal-Chei the kings מִדְיָ֜ן <S%H4080><s%> mid-Yan of Midian הָרְג֣וּ <S%H2026><s%> ha-re-Gu And they slew עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- beside חַלְלֵיהֶ֗ם <S%H2491><s%> chal-lei-Hem, the rest of them that were slain אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- אֱוִ֤י <S%H189><s%> 'e-Vi [namely] Evi וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et רֶ֙קֶם֙ <S%H7552><s%> re-kem and Rekem וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et צ֤וּר <S%H6698><s%> tzur and Zur וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et חוּר֙ <S%H2354><s%> chur and Hur וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et רֶ֔בַע <S%H7254><s%> Re-va', and Reba חֲמֵ֖שֶׁת <S%H2568><s%> cha-Me-shet five מַלְכֵ֣י <S%H4428><s%> mal-Chei kings מִדְיָ֑ן <S%H4080><s%> mid-Yan; of Midian וְאֵת֙ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et בִּלְעָ֣ם <S%H1109><s%> bil-'Am Balaam בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- also the son בְּע֔וֹר <S%H1160><s%> be-'or, of Beor הָרְג֖וּ <S%H2026><s%> ha-re-Gu they slew בֶּחָֽרֶב׃ <S%H2719><s%> be-Cha-rev. with the sword

וַיִּשְׁבּ֧וּ <S%H7617><s%> vai-yish-Bu captives בְנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> ve-nei- And the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֛ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El of Israel אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- נְשֵׁ֥י <S%H802><s%> ne-Shei took [all] the women מִדְיָ֖ן <S%H4080><s%> mid-Yan of Midian וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et טַפָּ֑ם <S%H2945><s%> tap-Pam; and their little ones וְאֵ֨ת <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- and all בְּהֶמְתָּ֧ם <S%H929><s%> be-hem-Tam of all their cattle וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- and all מִקְנֵהֶ֛ם <S%H4735><s%> mik-ne-Hem and all their flocks וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- and all חֵילָ֖ם <S%H2428><s%> chei-Lam and all their goods בָּזָֽזוּ׃ <S%H962><s%> ba-Za-zu. and took the spoil

וְאֵ֤ת <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all עָרֵיהֶם֙ <S%H5892><s%> 'a-rei-Hem all their cities בְּמ֣וֹשְׁבֹתָ֔ם <S%H4186><s%> be-Moo-she-vo-Tam, wherein they dwelt וְאֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- and all טִֽירֹתָ֑ם <S%H2918><s%> ti-ro-Tam; and all their goodly castles שָׂרְפ֖וּ <S%H8313><s%> sa-re-Fu And they burnt בָּאֵֽשׁ׃ <S%H784><s%> ba-'Esh. with fire

וַיִּקְחוּ֙ <S%H3947><s%> vai-yik-Chu And they took אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all הַשָּׁלָ֔ל <S%H7998><s%> hash-sha-Lal, all the spoil וְאֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- and all הַמַּלְק֑וֹחַ <S%H4455><s%> ham-mal-Ko-ach; and all the prey בָּאָדָ֖ם <S%H120><s%> ba-'a-Dam [both] of men וּבַבְּהֵמָֽה׃ <S%H929><s%> u-vab-be-he-Mah. and of beasts

וַיָּבִ֡אוּ <S%H935><s%> vai-ya-Vi-'u And they brought אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to מֹשֶׁה֩ <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh unto Moses וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> ve-'el- and to אֶלְעָזָ֨ר <S%H499><s%> 'el-'a-Zar and Eleazar הַכֹּהֵ֜ן <S%H3548><s%> hak-ko-Hen the priest וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> ve-'el- and to עֲדַ֣ת <S%H5712><s%> 'a-Dat and unto the congregation בְּנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> be-nei- of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַשְּׁבִ֧י <S%H7628><s%> hash-she-Vi the captives וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et הַמַּלְק֛וֹחַ <S%H4455><s%> ham-mal-Ko-ach and the prey וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et הַשָּׁלָ֖ל <S%H7998><s%> hash-sha-Lal and the spoil אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to הַֽמַּחֲנֶ֑ה <S%H4264><s%> ham-ma-cha-Neh; unto the camp אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- at עַֽרְבֹ֣ת <S%H6160><s%> 'ar-Vot at the plains מוֹאָ֔ב <S%H4124><s%> mo-'Av, of Moab אֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- are by יַרְדֵּ֥ן <S%H3383><s%> yar-Den which [are] by Jordan יְרֵחֽוֹ׃ <S%H3405><s%> ye-re-Cho. [near] Jericho ס sa-Mek

וַיֵּ֨צְא֜וּ <S%H3318><s%> vai-Ye-tze-'U went forth מֹשֶׁ֨ה <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh And Moses וְאֶלְעָזָ֧ר <S%H499><s%> ve-'el-'a-Zar and Eleazar הַכֹּהֵ֛ן <S%H3548><s%> hak-ko-Hen the priest וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> ve-chol and all נְשִׂיאֵ֥י <S%H5387><s%> ne-si-'Ei and all the princes הָעֵדָ֖ה <S%H5712><s%> ha-'e-Dah of the congregation לִקְרָאתָ֑ם <S%H7125><s%> lik-ra-Tam; to meet אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- about מִח֖וּץ <S%H2351><s%> mi-Chutz them without לַֽמַּחֲנֶֽה׃ <S%H4264><s%> Lam-ma-cha-Neh. the camp

וַיִּקְצֹ֣ף <S%H7107><s%> vai-yik-Tzof was wroth מֹשֶׁ֔ה <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh, And Moses עַ֖ל <S%H5921><s%> 'al with פְּקוּדֵ֣י <S%H6485><s%> pe-ku-Dei with the officers הֶחָ֑יִל <S%H2428><s%> he-Cha-yil; of the host שָׂרֵ֤י <S%H8269><s%> sa-Rei [with] the captains הָאֲלָפִים֙ <S%H505><s%> ha-'a-la-Fim over thousands וְשָׂרֵ֣י <S%H8269><s%> ve-sa-Rei and captains הַמֵּא֔וֹת <S%H3967><s%> ham-me-'ot, over hundreds הַבָּאִ֖ים <S%H935><s%> hab-ba-'Im which came מִצְּבָ֥א <S%H6635><s%> mitz-tze-Va from הַמִּלְחָמָֽה׃ <S%H4421><s%> ham-mil-cha-Mah. the battle

וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer said אֲלֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H413><s%> 'a-lei-Hem and מֹשֶׁ֑ה <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh; And Moses הַֽחִיִּיתֶ֖ם <S%H2421><s%> ha-chi-yi-Tem unto them Have ye saved כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all נְקֵבָֽה׃ <S%H5347><s%> ne-ke-Vah. all the women

הֵ֣ן <S%H2005><s%> hen Behold הֵ֜נָּה <S%H2007><s%> Hen-nah Behold these הָי֨וּ <S%H1961><s%> ha-Yu caused לִבְנֵ֤י <S%H1121><s%> liv-Nei the children יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El of Israel בִּדְבַ֣ר <S%H1697><s%> bid-Var through the counsel בִּלְעָ֔ם <S%H1109><s%> bil-'Am, of Balaam לִמְסָר־ <S%H4560><s%> lim-sor- to commit מַ֥עַל <S%H4604><s%> Ma-'al trespass בַּיהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh against the LORD עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- in דְּבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> de-var- in the matter פְּע֑וֹר <S%H6465><s%> pe-'or; of Peor וַתְּהִ֥י <S%H1961><s%> vat-te-Hi caused הַמַּגֵּפָ֖ה <S%H4046><s%> ham-mag-ge-Fah and there was a plague בַּעֲדַ֥ת <S%H5712><s%> ba-'a-Dat among the congregation יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh. of the LORD

וְעַתָּ֕ה <S%H6258><s%> ve-'at-Tah Now הִרְג֥וּ <S%H2026><s%> hir-Gu Now therefore kill כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> chol every זָכָ֖ר <S%H2145><s%> za-Char every male בַּטָּ֑ף <S%H2945><s%> bat-Taf; among the little ones וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> ve-chol every אִשָּׁ֗ה <S%H802><s%> 'ish-Shah, every woman יֹדַ֥עַת <S%H3045><s%> yo-Da-'at that hath known אִ֛ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'ish man לְמִשְׁכַּ֥ב <S%H4904><s%> le-mish-Kav by lying זָכָ֖ר <S%H2145><s%> za-Char with him הֲרֹֽגוּ׃ <S%H2026><s%> ha-Ro-gu. and kill

וְכֹל֙ <S%H3605><s%> ve-Chol all הַטַּ֣ף <S%H2945><s%> hat-Taf children בַּנָּשִׁ֔ים <S%H802><s%> ban-na-Shim, But all the women אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher who לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- have not יָדְע֖וּ <S%H3045><s%> ya-de-'U that have not known מִשְׁכַּ֣ב <S%H4904><s%> mish-Kav by lying זָכָ֑ר <S%H2145><s%> za-Char; a man הַחֲי֖וּ <S%H2421><s%> ha-cha-Yu with him keep alive לָכֶֽם׃ la-Chem.

וְאַתֶּ֗ם <S%H859><s%> ve-'at-Tem, and you חֲנ֛וּ <S%H2583><s%> cha-Nu And do ye abide מִח֥וּץ <S%H2351><s%> mi-Chutz without לַֽמַּחֲנֶ֖ה <S%H4264><s%> lam-ma-cha-Neh the camp שִׁבְעַ֣ת <S%H7651><s%> shiv-'At seven יָמִ֑ים <S%H3117><s%> ya-Mim; days כֹּל֩ <S%H3605><s%> kol whoever הֹרֵ֨ג <S%H2026><s%> ho-Reg whosoever hath killed נֶ֜פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> Ne-fesh any person וְכֹ֣ל׀ <S%H3605><s%> ve-Chol and whoever נֹגֵ֣עַ <S%H5060><s%> no-Ge-a' and whosoever hath touched בֶּֽחָלָ֗ל <S%H2491><s%> be-cha-Lal, any slain תִּֽתְחַטְּא֞וּ <S%H2398><s%> tit-chat-te-'U purify בַּיּ֤וֹם <S%H3117><s%> bai-Yom day הַשְּׁלִישִׁי֙ <S%H7992><s%> hash-she-li-Shi on the third וּבַיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> u-vai-Yom day הַשְּׁבִיעִ֔י <S%H7637><s%> hash-she-vi-'I, and on the seventh אַתֶּ֖ם <S%H859><s%> 'at-Tem you וּשְׁבִיכֶֽם׃ <S%H7628><s%> u-she-vi-Chem. [both] yourselves and your captives
